items.title: A Mathematician’s Lament
items.author: Paul Lockhart
items.useful: A sharp, influential critique of traditional math education. Explains why math is an art form and how school often kills curiosity and creativity.

items.title: Complete Kubernetes Course
items.author: DevOps Directive
items.useful: A comprehensive, high-quality Kubernetes course that takes you from zero to production-ready skills. Dense, practical, and extremely well-structured.

items.title: Functional Parsing
items.author: Computerphile
items.useful: Clear, intuitive explanation of functional parsing. Breaks down core concepts in a way that makes the underlying ideas finally click.

items.title: Generative Deep Learning 2nd Ed
items.author: David Foster
items.useful: Excellent, practical introduction to generative models. Makes complex concepts accessible, even if you don’t have a heavy technical background.

items.title: Getting Started with FPGAs
items.author: Russell Merrick
items.useful: A practical beginner-friendly introduction to FPGAs. It breaks down digital logic design and reprogrammable hardware concepts in a way that’s easy to follow.

items.title: I See What You Mean
items.author: Peter Alvaro
items.useful: Understanding and improving how we interact with databases in distributed systems.

items.title: In the Name of Identity
items.author: Amin Maalouf
items.useful: Provides meaningful and understandable rhetoric on what identity is, how it forms and why restricting yourself to a single/handful of identities hides your true self. Very insightful on societal pressure for people to b…

items.title: JSON Configuration language
items.author: Google
items.useful: Jsonnet is a super-set of JSON allows you to write configurations with nice primitive features like conditions, functions, variables, imports etc. and generate various output files like TOML, YAML, BASH etc.

items.title: Manim (Mathemathical Animation Engine)
items.author: 3blue1brown
items.useful: Powerful open-source engine for creating mathematical animations. Used by 3Blue1Brown, great for explaining complex concepts visually.

items.title: Neural Networks Playlist
items.author: 3blue1brown
items.useful: One of the clearest explanations of neural networks and backpropagation ever made. Visual, intuitive, and perfect for building real understanding.

items.title: NotebookLM
items.author: Google
items.useful: NotebookLM lets you shove whole books, docs, and resources in and pull out the core concepts fast. Clean, accurate, and grounded in the actual source. You can spin those ideas into mindmaps, quizzes, flashcards, or what…

items.title: Ultralearning
items.author: Scott H. Young
items.useful: A practical framework for mastering skills quickly through aggressive, self-directed learning. Clear principles backed by real case studies.
